'''KAW''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "shelter".<ref name=PEE>{{PE|Eldarin}}, pp. 156, 164 (stem appearing as "√KAW")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''koä'' ("building used for a dwelling or other purposes")<ref name=PEE/>

==Other versions of the legendarium==

In the ''Qenya Lexicon'' appears the root KAVA, from which was derived [[Qenya]] ''kava'' ("cellar, cave, vault").<ref>{{PE|12}}</ref>
